Internal Rules

TITLE 11: TECHNICAL RULES

Contents

  1. Rule 11.1

Rule 11.1

The Technical Committee shall make, amend and publish from time to time Technical Rules governing the development of software. All Members and Partners shall abide by the Technical Rules.
